title: Low FPS - Need a fix
body: I have the same computer as everyone else in my school and all of my friends that play lol are able to play just fine. I was able to play on my computer well until the beginning of the summer. I had about 60 fps and 34ms ping (which hasnt changed) but now my fps is from 01-06 fps constantly. What can i do. I tried the whole troubleshoot and nothing worked.

replies.body: Your drivers may have become outdated and causing your FPS to drop lower than what you're used to.  To rule out some possibilities, though, I recommend going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Go through each step to help tune-up your computer, keeping in mind that it can't exceed the limit of your hardware.  Hope it helps!
